_header: Saint John the apostle and evangelist
_description: Gospel for the Twenty-fifth Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Ion þe appostell & euangelistTells till vs how ihesus crist…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …vnto his fest þat we may wendeAnd won in welth with owten ende
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Cum subleuasset oculos ihesus crist”; ends “AMEN.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.178-182.
